_header: Hail full of grace Christ is with thee
Note: May be first stanza of 1748, which follows; formerly included as third stanza of 2535.
_description: A translation of Ave Maria, by James Ryman — one stanza rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
Hayle full of grace crist is with theBlessed thou be of women
                    alle…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…O marie myelde meke chast & pureSo that of blisse we may
                    be sure
